issue.title: Foot glitches near table on sample task 2

content.raw:
When I look at the contacts during simulation, the forces look fine. when I play the log file, the lines are smaller. 
I'm seeing these glitches in 1 out of 3 runs. In some cases, the robot balances itself and the task doesn't fail but if the robot has the panel in hand it falls down due to this glitch.  To me, it looks like some delay in communication between state estimator and controller which forces the controller to believe robot is in a different state and sends wrong control torques. I never noticed this issue in the previous version of master.
